TalentsTiers.Name: Spirit Tap
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to gain a [@value2]% bonus to your Spirit after killing a target that yields experience or honor.  For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a [@value3]% rate while casting. Lasts [@value4] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Spirit Tap
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death critical strikes increase your total Spirit by [@value]%. For the duration, your mana will regenerate at a [@value2]% rate while casting. Lasts [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Darkness
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Shadow spell damage by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Affinity
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by [@value]% and you receive [@value2]% of your base mana when your shadow Word: Pain or Vampiric Touch spells are dispelled.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Shadow Word: Pain
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to hit with your Shadow spells by [@value]%, and reduces the mana cost of your Shadow spells by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Psychic Scream
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Mind Blast
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by [@value] sec., and while in Shadowform your Mind Blast also has a [@value2]% chance to reduce all healing done by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mind Flay
TalentsTiers.Description:
7% of base mana
30 yd range

Channeled
Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 588 Shadow damage over 3 sec and slowing the target to 50% of their movement speed.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Veiled Shadows
TalentsTiers.Description: Decreases the cooldown of your Fade ability by [@value] sec, and reduces the cooldown of your Shadowfiend ability by [@value2] minute.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Reach
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your offensive Priest Shadow spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Weaving
TalentsTiers.Description: Your damaging Priest Shadow spells have a [@value]% chance to increase the Shadow damage you deal by [@value3]% for [@value2] sec. Stacks up to [@value4] times.

TalentsTiers.Name: Silence
TalentsTiers.Description:
255 Mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
45 sec cooldown

Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 5 sec. Non-player victim spellcasting is also interrupted by 3 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vampiric Embrace
TalentsTiers.Description: Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy, causing you to be healed for 15% and any other party members to be healed for 3% of any single target Priest Shadow damage you deal for 30 min.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Vampiric Embrace
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the percentage healed by Vampiric Embrace by an additional [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Focused Mind
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Mind Blast, Mind Control, Mind Flay and Mind Sear spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mind Melt
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Mind Blast, Mind Flay, and Mind Sear spells by [@value]%, and increases the periodic critical strike chance of your vampiric Touch, Devouring Plague and Shadow Word: Pain by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Devouring Plague
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the periodic damage done by your Devouring Plague by [@value]%, and when you cast Devouring Plague you instantly deal damage equal to [@value2]% of its total periodic effect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadowform
TalentsTiers.Description: Assume a Shadowform, increasing your Shadow damage by 15% and reducing all threat generated by 30%. However, you may not cast Healing spells while in this form. Grants the periodic damage from your Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch spells the ability to critically hit for 100% increased damage and grants Devouring Plague and Vampiric Touch the ability to benefit from haste.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Mind Blast, Mind Flay and Shadow Word: Death spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Shadowform
TalentsTiers.Description: You take [@value]% reduced damage while in Shadowform. Your Fade ability now has a [@value2]% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when used while in Shadowform, and reduces casting or channeling time lost when damaged by [@value3]% when casting any Shadow spell while in Shadowform.

TalentsTiers.Name: Misery
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Shadow Word: Pain, Mind Flay and Vampiric Touch spells also increase the chance for harmful spells to hit by [@value]% lasting [@value2] sec, and increases the damage of your Mind Blast, Mind Flay and Mind Sear spells by an amount equal to [@value3]% of your spell power.

TalentsTiers.Name: Psychic Horror
TalentsTiers.Description:
13% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
2 min cooldown

You terrify the target, causing them to tremble in horror for 3 sec and drop their main hand and ranged weapons for 10 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Vampiric Touch
TalentsTiers.Description:
13% of base mana
30 yd range

1.5 sec cast
Causes 850 Shadow damage over 15 sec to your target and causes up to 10 party or raid members to gain 1% of their maximum mana per 5 sec when you deal damage from Mind Blast. In addition if Vampiric Touch is dispelled it will cause 1360 damage to the afflicted target.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Pain and Suffering
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Mind Flay has a [@value]% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target, and reduces the damage you take from your own Shadow Word: Death by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Twisted Faith
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your spell power by [@value]% of your total Spirit, and your damage done by your Mind Flay and Mind Blast is increased by [@value2]% if your target is afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain.

TalentsTiers.Name: Dispersion
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
2 min cooldown

You disperse into pure Shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 90%. You are unable to attack or cast spells, but you regenerate 6% mana every 1 sec for 6 sec. Dispersion can be cast while stunned, feared or silenced and clears all nare and movement imparing effects when cast, and makes you immune to them while dispersed.
